mapper.select: select COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS month, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS today from ehealth_card

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') AS name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ehealth_card WHERE create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{size} MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) <= 17 THEN '0-17岁' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 18 AND 39 THEN '18-39岁' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 40 AND 59 THEN '40~59岁' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) >= 60 THEN '60岁以上' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ehealth_card GROUP BY name
SELECT hospital_name as name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ehealth_card GROUP BY hospital_id ORDER BY count desc limit #{size}
SELECT apply_address AS name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ehealth_card GROUP BY apply_address ORDER BY count desc
